title: Known issues
content:
Category Issue ID Description Found in version
Service Management OCTCL19XW2721453 Dev2Prod export or import fails when data records do not contain a UUID. See Workaround 25.3
Service Management OCTCR19XW2508184 When accessing the Related CIs tab for SACM records in Service Management, the tab fails to load and displays an error message similar to the following: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'map').

Note: You also need to upgrade UD/UCMDB 25.2.x to 25.4 or apply the hotfix mentioned in the 25.2 workaround.

 25.2
Service Management OCTCR19XW2722859
Suite upgrade on AKS fails with Ingress should allow https only. error if the built-in Azure policy 'Kubernetes clusters should be accessible only over HTTPS' is enabled.
See the workaround.
 25.2
Service Management OCTCR19M2080015

When viewed in the Outlook web app, notification emails based on some notification templates contain awkward line breaks.

See the workaround.

 2023.05
Service Management N/A

In SAM, the deployment information for VMware vRealize Operations and Oracle products isn't visible.

See the workaround.

 2022.05
Service Management OCTCR19M1320762

With Native SACM enabled, if you use the IN operator for an attribute in the boolean type such as Virtual Device when defining a rule, an error occurs when being processed by the UCMDB Gateway. The reason is that the UCMDB Gateway doesn't support the IN operator for a boolean value.

There is no workaround for this issue.

 2020.11
Service Management OCTCR19M1180840

Clicking the Back button reloads the standard view instead of using the previous state filter in the SACM module.

See the workaround.

 2020.05
Service Management OCTCR19M1059071 When exporting a Request to XLS in Turkish, the PhaseId is displayed in English. 2020.05

Customer Service Management

N/A

When a product model is added in the Audience section of a news article, the article should be visible only to service portal users who have entitlements for product instances of that model and only when the product instances are in the In use or Expiring state. If a product instance moves from In use or Expiring to Inactive, the article should no longer be visible to the user. However, due to application cache issues, the article may still appear for up to 24 hours after the state change.
 

The same cache limitation also applies to entitlement rules. When an entitlement rule is deleted, the news article should stop being visible to users covered by that rule, but due to cache issues, it may continue to appear for up to 24 hours.
 

Workaround: The issue resolves automatically after the cache refresh. No manual action is needed.

25.4
Cloud Management - Design and deploy OCTCR19XW2469041 Test deployments and subscriptions get stuck after upgrading to 25.2. See the workaround. 25.2
Cloud Management - Design and Deploy OCTCR19M807912 Operation Orchestration external RAS call to AWS based DND URL is failing with SSLPeerUnverifiedException: peer not authenticated. There is no workaround for this issue. 2020.08
Cloud Management -CGRO OCTCR19M1175540 

Data collection is failing for cloud cost data providers after upgrade from 2020.08 to 2020.11.

See the workaround

 2020.11

Integration

N/A

For integration engine-based integrations through the OPB agent, the Request details field in the task queue details page is empty.

2022.05

Integration

N/A

In the configuration page for generic or no auth types of REST Executor 2.0 endpoints, leading or trailing spaces in Expression fields will cause expression parse failure.

2022.05
Studio OCTCR19M1466413 A validation business rule in combination with CI detection does not show an error message in the user interface. It's only recorded in the log file. 2021.05
Studio OCTCR19M1321659 A transition condition failure prevents After Change rules from executing. This issue can be avoided by saving the ticket before moving its phase. 2020.11
Enterprise Service Management OCTCR19XW2526446 Failed to create task on change record. 2023.05
Cloud Management OCTCR19XW2732644

Cloud cost data collection fails with a permission error on the projection_columns table in Vertica. The error appears as: ERROR: Permission denied for relation projection_columns.

See the workaround.

 26.1
